title: Fragments, "The Four Elements", 1783–89
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave foundation.
dimensions:
A. Warp: 142.5 cm (56 1/2 in.). Weft: 30.5 cm (12in.). B. Warp: 25 cm (9 3/4 in.). Weft: 67.5 cm (26 1/2 in.). C. Warp: 24 cm (9 1/2 in.). Weft: 70 cm (27 1/2 in.). D. Warp: 28 cm (11 in.). Weft: 76.5 cm (30 in.). E. Warp: 23 cm (9 in.). Weft: 69 cm (27 1/4 in.). F. Warp: 12 cm (4 3/4 in.). Weft: 88 cm (34 1/2 in.). G. Warp: 16 cm (6 1/4 in). Weft: 64 cm (25 1/4 in.). H. Warp: 23 cm (9 1/4 in.). Weft: 50.5 cm (20 in.). I. Warp: 13 cm (5 in.). Weft: 76 cm (30 in.). J. Warp: 24 cm (9 1/2 in.). Weft: 63 cm (24 3/4 in.). K. Warp: 35.5 cm (14in.). Weft: 24.5cm (9 3/4in.) L. Warp: 56cm (22in.). Weft: 33cm (13in.). M. Warp: 66 cm (226 in.) Weft: 34.5 cm (13 1/2 in.). N. Warp: 30.5 cm (12 in.). Weft: 25 cm (9 3/4 in.) O. Warp: 24 cm (9 1/2 in.). Weft: 19 cm (7 1/2 in.).
Pattern: Height of repeat (taken from A): 99 cm (39 in.).
description: 15 different fragments which when put together can almost form the repeat of the fabric.There are shaped cartouches containing scenes from mythology which symbolize the four elements; fire water, earth and air. In red on white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragments, "The Four Elements", 1783–89.
1783–89. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave foundation.. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-71-a/o.
